name: Sklearn Logistic Regression
description: Logistic Regression is a linear model for classification and implementation can fit binary, One-vs-Rest, or multinomial logistic regression with optional , or Elastic-Net regularization.

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: featureCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: Feature columns of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: penalty
fields.title: Penalty
fields.description: The norm used in the penalization.

fields.name: dual
fields.title: Dual
fields.description: Dual or primal formulation.

fields.name: tol
fields.title: Tol
fields.description: Tolerance for stopping criteria.

fields.name: C
fields.title: C
fields.description: Inverse of regularization strength; must be a positive float.

fields.name: fit_intercept
fields.title: Fitintercept
fields.description: Specifies if a constant (a.k.a. bias or intercept) should be added to the decision function.

fields.name: intercept_scaling
fields.title: InterceptScaling
fields.description: Useful only when the solver 'liblinear' is used and fit_intercept is set to True.

fields.name: class_weight
fields.title: ClassWeight
fields.description: Weights associated with classes in the form {class_label: weight}.

fields.name: random_state
fields.title: RandomState
fields.description: The seed of the pseudo random number generator to use when shuffling the data.

fields.name: solver
fields.title: Solver
fields.description: Algorithm to use in the optimization problem.

fields.name: max_iter
fields.title: Maxiter
fields.description: Maximum number of iterations taken for the solvers to converge.

fields.name: multi_class
fields.title: MultiClass
fields.description: If the option chosen is 'ovr', then a binary problem is fit for each label. For 'multinomial' the loss minimised is the multinomial loss fit across the entire probability distribution.

fields.name: verbose
fields.title: Verbose
fields.description: For the liblinear and lbfgs solvers set verbose to any positive number for verbosity.

fields.name: warm_start
fields.title: WarmStart
fields.description: When set to True, reuse the solution of the previous call to fit as initialization.

fields.name: path
fields.title: Save Confusion Matrix Path
fields.description: Save Confusion Matrix

fields.name: output_confusion_matrix_chart
fields.title: Output Confusion Matrix Chart
fields.description: whether to display confusion matrix chart.

fields.name: cm_chart_title
fields.title: Confusion Matrix Chart Title
fields.description: Title name to display in Confusion Matrix Chart

fields.name: cm_chart_description
fields.value: Visual Representation of Predicted vs. Actual Classes
fields.title: Confusion Matrix Chart Description
fields.description: Description to display in Confusion Matrix CHart

fields.name: confusionMatrixTargetLegend
fields.title: Confusion Matrix Target Legend
fields.description: Legend name to display for Target in Confusion Matrix

fields.name: confusionMatrixPredictedLabelLegend
fields.title: Confusion Matrix PredictedLabel Legend
fields.description: Legend name to display for Predicted Label in Confusion Matrix

fields.name: confusionMatrixCountLegend
fields.title: Confusion Matrix Count Legend
fields.description: Legend name to display for Count in Confusion Matrix

fields.name: confusionMatrixRowDescription
fields.title: Confusion Matrix Outcome description
fields.description: One can provide the business details of the outcome of the confusion matrix rows

fields.name: output_roc_curve
fields.title: Output ROC Curve
fields.description: whether to display confusion matrix chart.

fields.name: roc_title
fields.title: ROC Curve Chart Title
fields.description: Title name to display in ROC Curve Chart

fields.name: roc_description
fields.title: ROC Curve Chart Description
fields.description: Add Description for ROC Curve Chart

fields.name: xlabel
fields.title: X Label
fields.description: X label

fields.name: ylabel
fields.title: Y Label
fields.description: Y Label
